ratings.comment: He has this belief system that he is correct about everything because he studies major political figures as his job/passion and writes about them. He thinks if you disagree with him it's because you're just not as smart as he is. I approached him with respect on a twitter account he doesn't know is mine and, as expected, he called me a rude name...

Helped me rediscover my love of poetry. Dude is an expert when it comes to literature and literary theory, and also has a pedagogical approach that is a welcome break from usual academia. Seth is a fantastic teacher. If you get a chance, take his class.

Seth is probably the smartest man I have ever had teach me. He genuinely cares about your success. His Metamodernistic spin to the class may be frustrating at first, but once you truly understand it, it's actually very interesting. He is a fair grader and is understanding about late work, absences, tough assignments, etc. You will learn a lot.
He is incredibly kind and very helpful in regards to proper English grammar.
Interesting background with being a lawyer. Course has a criminal justice emphasis which made it interesting.
He's super helpful, not boring, is pretty funny, and makes the class interesting. And you actually learn something!

Seth is by far one of the best teachers ive ever had at UW-Madison.  He puts his own spin of criminal justice into the english class so that the prompts for writing assignment are more interesting.  He has a really interesting background between being a former lawyer and published poet.  I would highly recommend his class, you wont regret it!
different way of teaching. learned more than I thought I would. fun, likes to use games, but they are effective.
He knows what he'a doing and makes English class very pragmatic in nature. I'm very glad I took this class. He even bought pizza on the last day for everyone.
Makes class really interesting and focused class on Criminal Justice.  Always welcomed questions about the outside world and how the legal system worked.  Recommend this class to everyone!
